{{No poly flag}} |resistances=~ |vulnerabilities={{Silver vulnerability}}, ~ |max_chunks=0 |meat={{No corpse}} |xp=~ |holiness={{Natural}} |magic_resistance=~ |hp_range=~ |avg_hp=~ |armour_class=~ |evasion=~ |habitat=~ |speed=~ |size=~ |item_use={{Uses nothing}} |attack1=~ |attack2=~ |attack3=~ |attack4=~ |hit_dice=~ |base_hp=~ |extra_hp=~ |fixed_hp=~ |intelligence={{Animal intelligence}} |genus=chimera |species=chimera }} {{Flavour|A grotesque parody of nature, this fantastical creature consists of three individual beasts combined into one.}} ==Useful Info== '''Chimeras''' are 3-headed hybrid monsters that can only be generated by evoking the [[box of beasts]]. They use the primary attacks of the second two monsters as its auxiliary attacks and can use spells and special abilities from all three monsters. The three parts of a chimera are chosen from this list: [[Butterfly]], [[Rat]], [[Bat]], [[Jackal]], [[Adder]], [[Hound]], [[Water moccasin]], [[Sky beast]], [[Crocodile]], [[Hog]], [[Ice beast]], [[Yak]], [[Polar bear]], [[Wyvern]], [[Wolf]], [[Alligator]], [[Grizzly bear]], [[Warg]], [[Elephant]], [[Griffon]], [[Black bear]], [[Catoblepas]], [[Death yak]], [[Anaconda]], [[Raven]], [[Dire elephant]], [[Dragon]], [[Ancient bear]], [[Apis]], [[Hellephant]] and [[Golden dragon]] ==History== *Chimeras were replaced by [[mutant beast]]s in [[0.17]]. *Chimeras were added in [[0.13]].
